rules.name: Astartes
rules.description:
During each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operative’s activation, it can perform either two Shoot actions or two Fight actions. If it’s two Shoot actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or PSYCHIC weapon must be selected for at least one of them. You cannot select the same PSYCHIC weapon more than once per activation.
Each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operative can counteract regardless of its order.

rules.name: Disgustingly Resilient
rules.description: Whenever an attack dice inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operative, roll one D6: on a 4+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

specialRules.name: Grandfather's Blessing
specialRules.description: Whenever an enemy operative that has one of your Poison tokens loses one or more wounds within 7" of this operative, this operative regains up to an equal number of lost wounds (to a maximum of 3 lost wounds per turning point, and only if this operative isn’t incapacitated).

specialActions.name: Poisonous Miasma (1AP)
specialActions.description:
▶ PSYCHIC. Select one enemy operative visible to and within 7" of this operative, or one enemy operative that’s a valid target for this operative. That enemy operative gains one of your Poison tokens (if it doesn’t already have one). If it already has one, inflict 3 damage on that enemy operative instead.
◆ An operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

specialActions.name: Putrescent Vitality (1AP)
specialActions.description:
▶ PSYCHIC. Select one friendly operative visible to and within 3" of this operative, then roll 2D6: if the result is 7, the selected operative regains 7 lost wounds; otherwise, the selected operative regains lost wounds equal to the highest D6.
◆ An operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

specialRules.name: Grenadier
specialRules.description: This operative can use blight and krak grenades (see faction and universal equipment). Doing so doesn’t count towards any limited uses you have (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment for other operatives). Whenever it’s doing so, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1 and blight grenades have the Toxic weapon rule.

specialActions.name: Flail (1AP)
specialActions.description:
▶ Inflict D3+2 damage on each other operative that’s both visible to and within 2" of this operative. Roll separately for each: if it’s an enemy operative, on a 3, that enemy operative also gains one of your Poison tokens (if it doesn’t already have one).
◆ This operative cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order, or during an activation in which it has performed more than one **Fight** action, and it cannot perform more than one **Fight** action during an activation in which it performs this action.

specialRules.name: Icon Bearer
specialRules.description: Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operative’s APL stat as 1 higher. Note this isn’t a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

specialRules.name: Icon of Contagion
specialRules.description: Whenever this operative is within your opponent's territory, the Contagion strategy ploy costs you 0CP.

specialRules.name: Repulsive Fortitude
specialRules.description: Whenever an operative is shooting this operative, defence dice results of 5+ are critical successes.
